Package zoo

Class RattleSnake

java.lang.Object
zoo.Animal
zoo.Snake
zoo.RattleSnake
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Animal>
public class RattleSnake extends Snake
Represents a Rattlesnake, a specific type of Snake. Rattlesnakes have an additional field for the number of rattle segments.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • RattleSnake

      public RattleSnake(String name, int age, int rattleSegments)
      Constructs a Rattlesnake with the given name, age, and number of rattle segments. All rattlesnakes are venomous. Any exception message is fine, but it should clearly describe the reason for the exception (e.g., "Rattle segments must be between 8 and 13 inclusive.").
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the rattlesnake. Cannot be null.
      age - the age of the rattlesnake. Must be greater than 0.
      rattleSegments - the number of rattle segments. Must be between 8 and 13 inclusive.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is null, age is less than or equal to 0, or rattle segments are out of range.

  • Method Details

      the number of rattle segments.
